azurerm_spatial_anchors_account.description: Manages an Azure Spatial Anchors Account.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Spatial Anchors Account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Spatial Anchors Account.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Spatial Anchors Account.

create.description: Used when creating the Spatial Anchors Account.

update.description: Used when updating the Spatial Anchors Account.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Spatial Anchors Account.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Spatial Anchors Account.
